WITH MENU_PATH ( MENU_ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, DEPTH, FIRST, SECOND, THIRD, PAGE_URL ) AS ( SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, PARENT_ID, DEPTH, MENU_NM AS FIRST, CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR2(255)) AS SECOND, CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR2(255)) AS THIRD, PAGE_URL FROM TB_MENU WHERE DEPTH = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.MENU_NM, M.PARENT_ID, M.DEPTH, MP.FIRST, CASE WHEN M.DEPTH = 2 THEN M.MENU_NM ELSE MP.SECOND END, CASE WHEN M.DEPTH = 3 THEN M.MENU_NM ELSE MP.THIRD END, M.PAGE_URL FROM TB_MENU M JOIN MENU_PATH MP ON M.PARENT_ID = MP.MENU_ID ) SELECT MP.MENU_ID, FIRST, SECOND, THIRD, TMP.COM_PATH, MP.PAGE_URL, MP.DEPTH, MP.PARENT_ID FROM MENU_PATH MP JOIN TB_ROLE_MENU TRM ON MP.MENU_ID = TRM.MENU_ID JOIN TB_USER TU ON TRM.ROLE_ID = TU.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MENU_PATH TMP ON MP.MENU_ID = TMP.MENU_ID
WHERE TU.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT TM.MENU_ID, TM.MENU_NM, TM.PAGE_URL, TMP.COM_PATH FROM TB_MENU TM LEFT JOIN TB_MENU_PATH TMP ON TM.MENU_ID = TMP.MENU_ID WHERE TM.MENU_ID IN (2,3)
